title: Dennis@02
author: Dennis@02
content: The cryptocurrency market is currently buzzing with a myriad of projects like Unibot, Banana Bot, Unichat, and more, all of which have been delivering substantial returns to early investors. However, one project on the horizon that's truly captured my attention is Bubble Bot. You can find all the details about this intriguing project at Bubblebot.finance. Bubble Bot seems to possess significant potential, offering a comprehensive suite of features, including spot trading, robust risk management tools for pegged assets, versatile multi-staking options, and an exciting futures trading feature complete with limit order functionality.As of now, Bubble Bot has opened its whitelisting, and there are only 100 spots remaining. The question is, should i secure a spot for my wallet on this whitelist? need your suggestionsÂ I also share their website link for more information.Link: https://bubblebot.finance/Presale Telegram bot: http://t.me/my_Bubble_bot

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: My anti-virus is blocking my access and when it's blocking my access then it's not safe to navigate or invest here I don't know about the other members honestly I don't like bots I'm not comfortable using it much more than investing in it, but you look like someone who just wants to hype this project if you're not then go invest on it if you find it with good potential.But I'd like to reiterate it's not good if a site is being blocked by an anti-virus checking on Virustotal only one AV is blocking it https://www.virustotal.com/gui/url/dcf825d99abe309c4f1546d3ddf6488178a232b936a5eb25e178f9cda8b41f8a?nocache=1 I have too much trust in my AV that I don't find that project to me.Anyway, it is my observation since you posted it here let's see what the others will say.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Dennis@02 on September 23, 2023, 10:40:02 AMAs of now, Bubble Bot has opened its whitelisting, and there are only 100 spots remaining. The question is, should i secure a spot for my wallet on this whitelist?Not at all , most likely you're the same person as this one, you're running a soft shill campaign to get everyone especially on this forum to pay attention to your project. If you're from the Bubblebot team, tell them to provide clear information on the website before making a sale, it's really confusing, the information is different between the website and on Twitter. For the safety of your money, I recommend just following their bounty campaign to get tokens, you don't have to spend any money and there's no risk, no need to join their sales.
